name: On The Alert
description:
The guardian of the order accepting an anonymous call learns that a gangster group has settled in one of the abandoned buildings. Upon arrival, he meets an armed rebuff. The task is to go through 20 rooms of the building, cleaning it up to the last enemy. To eliminate enemies, the hero has 3 types of weapons, with unique properties and variation. OTA-is a 2d platformer with elements of a shooter.

Game features

20 levels

Old school graphics

Variety of locations

Breathtaking battle
